column2: Which goes with which? Find the sentences with a similar meaning.
column3:
You must remember your password.
{{c1::You mustn't forget it.}}
column4: You mustn't stay here. / You mustn't be afraid. / You mustn't think about it. / You mustn't forget it. / You mustn't be late. / You mustn't move anything.
